items.text: lifted! Full on middle, and angling into his pads. Nicholls gets under the ball, and whips it off his toes to the backward-square boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length just outside off, and he drags a pulled shot to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: back of a length, wide outside off stump. Batsman opts to let it go, but the umpire calls it 'extras' anyway
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, 1 wide

items.text: full outside off, and he leans forward to play a check-drive through the covers. Sabbir at deep extra cover putting in the hard yards there
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: length ball just outside off, but directed towards the off stump. Defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he miscues a muscled flick to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball, wide enough to cut, but he misses the shot! Ball goes over his blade to the keeper
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and the offbreak is met on the back foot. Slapped back to Mahmudullah
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, no run

items.text: edged! And it runs away to the third-man boundary. Too full for the attempted cut, and it gets a thick outside edge past Liton's gloves
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, and he hammers a straight drive down the ground! Long on runs to his left in a bid to stop the ball, but all he can do is chaperone the ball into the ropes
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on middle, and the offbreak goes down the leg side. Liton can't hold onto it either, and that's some more extra runs for NZ
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, 2 wides

items.text: length ball on middle, and Nicholls punches with the straight bat. Right back to Mahmudullah
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on leg, and he gets down on one knee to sweep. Well struck, and played square of the fielder at fine leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: Fourteen-run over Full just outside off, and pushed to cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Slashes this square to deep point and that's Taylor's 8000th ODI run!
items.postText: Only seven away from going past Stephen Fleming as NZ's most prolific ODI batsman
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, and he leans forward to defend. Played to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and angling inwards. Blocked away to the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: slower ball, but full and wide. Driven away from his body to deep cover for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: Mashrafe almost takes a stunner! Full from around the wicket, and Nicholls' straight drive darts straight towards the non-striker. Mashrafe dives to his left to take a one-handed catch, while Taylor ducks to take cover. Ball hits his finger and rolls away to long-on, where the fielder's sliding effort stops the boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: length ball on off, and angling inwards. Pulled to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full at the base of leg stump. He splices a straight drive to long-on. New Zealand's 150
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and angling into his pads. Punched to wide long-on for a walking single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he leans forward to try to drag a sweep. Top-edges it, and Tamim won't make any mistake at deep midwicket. Nicholls perishes after a crafty half-century, but he'll be disappointed with the mode of dismissal
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, OUT

dismissal.text: HM Nicholls c Tamim Iqbal b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 64 (102m 74b 7x4 0x6) SR: 86.48

items.preText: NZ captain Latham at the other end
items.text: full on off, and the offbreak is worked towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes forward to defend towards point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run
